reason_for_recall: Coffee Toffee is recalled because pecan is listed on the Ingredients statement but it is not listed in the Contains statement.
product_description: Coffee Toffee - 4 oz. packages. UPC 6 55974 89001 2.    The label is read in parts: "***Ingredients: butter (milk), sugar, bittersweet chocolate 60% (cocoa liquor, emulsifier, soya lecithin, vanilla), coffee, pecans *** Contains: milk & soya ***".
